name: discourage
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: discourage
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make someone feel less confident, enthusiastic, and positive about something, or less willing to do something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 使泄气，给…泼冷水，使心灰意冷

example.eg: The thought of how much work she had to do discouraged her.
example.egtrans: 一想到还有那么多工作得做她就泄了气。

dsense.name: discourage
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to prevent or try to prevent something happening or someone doing something, by making things difficult or unpleasant, or by showing disapproval

example.eg: a campaign to discourage people from smoking
The authorities have put tanks on the streets to discourage any protest.
example.egtrans: 当局调动坦克上街以阻止抗议活动。
